Key Match Events: Lungi Ngidi took 4 wickets for 29 runs.
Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 runs off 40 balls.
David Miller scored 59 runs off 46 balls.
Aiden Markram scored 52 runs off 41 balls.
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets for 25 runs.
South Africa won by 5 wickets with 2 balls remaining.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Player of the Match was Lungi Ngidi.
Suryakumar Yadav was Cricinfo's MVP with 128.55 points.
India won the toss and elected to bat first.
Match was held at Perth Stadium.
South Africa earned 2 points from the match.
